oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter written by Thomas Forkner ot his sister in Chickasaw Nation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter was written by Thomas Forkner of Forked Creek, Monore County (Tenn.) to his sister Nancy Parsley. She was married to a Baptist preacher who moved to a church in Leon, Indian Territory, Chickasaw Nation (Oklahoma). The letter confirms that he paid the property taxes for her.
